trans-unit.source: Defines a configuration element for a UDP announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 定義 UDP 公告端點的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: A UDP announcement endpoint is a standard endpoint that utilizes UDP transport protocol that specifies where a discoverable service sends announcement messages and where an announcement service listens for announcement messages.
trans-unit.target: UDP 公告端點是一種利用 UDP 傳輸通訊協定的標準端點，此通訊協定會指定可探索服務傳送公告訊息的位置，以及探索服務接聽公告訊息的位置。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.UdpAnnouncementEndpointElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.UdpAnnouncementEndpointElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, creates and initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint" /> class that uses the contract description of the current Discovery protocol version and mode.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別呼叫或覆寫時，建立並初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint" /> 類別的新執行個體，此新執行個體是使用目前「探索」通訊協定版本與模式的合約描述。

trans-unit.source: A UDP announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: UDP 公告端點。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, gets the type of the UDP announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別呼叫或覆寫時，會取得 UDP 公告端點的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the UDP announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: UDP 公告端點的型別。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的服務端點物件。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> into a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> 轉換成 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum delay a service is required to wait before sending announcement messages.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定服務在傳送公告訊息前需要等候的延遲上限。

trans-unit.source: The maximum delay.
trans-unit.target: 延遲上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.UdpAnnouncementEndpointElement.MulticastAddress" /> property of a UDP announcement endpoint element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 UDP 公告端點項目的 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.UdpAnnouncementEndpointElement.MulticastAddress" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A URI address.
trans-unit.target: URI 位址。

trans-unit.source: The multicast address is the IP address from which messages are sent simultaneously to multiple host computers.
trans-unit.target: 多點傳輸位址是從中同步傳送訊息到多主機電腦的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, converts the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> to a UDP announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別呼叫或覆寫時，會將指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> 轉換為 UDP 公告端點。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint to which UDP announcement configuration settings are applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用 UDP 公告組態設定的服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, converts the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> to a UDP announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別呼叫或覆寫時，會將指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> 轉換為 UDP 公告端點。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint to which UDP announcement configuration settings are applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用 UDP 公告組態設定的服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, converts the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> to a UDP announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別呼叫或覆寫時，會將指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> 轉換為 UDP 公告端點。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, initializes and validates the specified endpoint element.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別呼叫或覆寫時，會初始化並驗證指定的端點項目。

trans-unit.source: The channel endpoint element to initialize and validate.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化及驗證的通道端點項目。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, initializes and validates the specified instance of a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別呼叫或覆寫時，會初始化並驗證 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement" /> 的指定執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint element to initialize and validate.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化及驗證的服務端點項目。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, initializes and validates the specified instance of a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別呼叫或覆寫時，會初始化並驗證 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement" /> 的指定執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, gets a collection of the configuration settings contained in a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.UdpAnnouncementEndpointElement" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別呼叫或覆寫時，取得 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.UdpAnnouncementEndpointElement" /> 執行個體中包含之組態設定的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: 組態設定的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binding settings of a UDP transport configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 UDP 傳輸組態項目的繫結設定。

trans-unit.source: A UDP configuration element.
trans-unit.target: UDP 組態項目。
